name: Momentum (itch) (sarang-s)
description: Momentum A simple endless runner. Install Instructions Download the zip file according to your operating system. Unzip the file and open the .exe file. Credits Music from www.freesound.org :- "less happy 0X26p" - Setuniman Made with Unity and coded in C#.Unity is a awesome, free, easy to learn game engine Check out the Brackeys youtube channel for tutorials. I made this from what I learned from: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL
